name: rhmf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)→(c0 : c3 → c4))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RingHom]c2)→(c0 : c3 → c4))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)

comment: A ring homomorphism is a function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)
